candidates.name: Mohammed Ahmed Khaled
candidates.about me: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented entry-level Flutter developer with a strong foundation in Dart programming and cross-platform mobile app development. Proficient in building responsive and user-friendly mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms. Adept at utilizing Flutter widgets, managing state, and integrating APIs. Passionate about continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends. Excels in collaborative environments and is committed to delivering high-quality code and innovative solutions. Currently seeking an entry-level Flutter developer position or internship to further develop my skills and contribute to innovative projects.
candidates.education: Bachelor in Computer Science, Benha University, Sep. 2018 – June 2022
preferred_roles: Entry-level Flutter developer position or internship
